LandingPage.subtitle: With our POS system for all types of supermarkets and stores, manage your sales efficiently and securely.
LandingPage.description: POSCO specializes in the sale of POS (Point of Sale) systems. We offer a SaaS service with different plans tailored to the needs of supermarkets and stores of all sizes.

advantages.billDescription: With our POS system you can generate fast and efficient invoices for your customers.
advantages.priceDescription: With our plans you can acquire your POS system at a good price regardless of the size of your store.
advantages.easyDescription: Our POS system is easy to use and manage, you don't need to be a technology expert to use it.

basicPlan.title: Basic Plan
basicPlan.description: The ideal plan for small shops and restaurants.

intermediatePlan.title: Intermediate Plan
intermediatePlan.description: Perfect for supermarkets and medium-sized restaurants.

advancedPlan.title: Advanced Plan
advancedPlan.description: Designed for large supermarket chains and restaurants.

LandingPage.testimonial1: "POSCO has transformed the way we manage our sales." - Fruver Market
LandingPage.testimonial2: "The best POS system we have ever used, it is very efficient and we see it reflected every day." - Maxi Fruver
LandingPage.testimonial3: "Everything we expect from a POS system: secure, reliable and fast." - Caribe Supermercados

About.title: dedicated to creating POS systems for supermarkets and stores.
About.description: POSCO is a company dedicated to creating POS systems for supermarkets and stores. Our goal is to offer an easy-to-use and efficient POS system for all types of stores. Our team is made up of technology and sales experts, which allows us to offer a high-quality POS system tailored to the needs of our customers.
About.visionDescription: To be the leading company in creating POS systems for supermarkets and stores in Latin America.
About.misionDescription: To offer an easy-to-use and efficient POS system for all types of stores, with the aim of improving sales management and increasing the productivity of our customers.

Contact.title: Do you have any questions?
Contact.subtitle: We are here to help you. If you have any questions or concerns, do not hesitate to contact us.
Contact.support: Find out the best product to boost your business
